name: Universal Business Listings
tag_list: universal-business-listing, local-search, business-profile-distribution, organic-seo, anchor-data, entrepreneur, business-listings, claiming, brand--trademark-protection, verification, smbs, sohos, advertising-solutions, agencies, channel-partners, affili
overview:
UniversalBusinessListing (UBL.org) provides a fast means for businesses of all sizes to get listed on all the major search engines, online yellow pages, social networks, mobile phones, 411 Directory Assistance, mapping sites and GPS navigation devices.

The organization provides its service primarily in USA, Canada and United Kingdom.

In the USA, UBL feeds directly into the main anchor databases e.g. InfoUSA (Infogroup) and Acxiom that are used as primary trusted sources by all major publishers, and in its more advanced services it also makes direct submissions to multiple high profile, prominent and highly search-optimized local directories, business listing sites, search engines and social sites.

The service is available direct to businesses via UBL’s retail dashboard, and the organization also provides partner/reseller and agency programs through its white label products and via direct API access, and an affiliate program for smaller resellers and web marketers.

UBL’s proposition is, for businesses a time and money saver in helping businesses get listed and found in the most important places online, and for partners and affiliates a new service and revenue opportunity from reselling the services through their own channel.

UniversalBusinessListing.org is one in a suite of Business Identity Management services offered by the company. Other services in the suite include: Reputation Management tools for monitoring online reputation, presence, buzz and social mentions; and Social Media Brand Protection & Monitoring (for securing, protecting and managing brands’ profiles across all the major and up-coming social media properties.

We specialize in helping major national brands, enterprises, SMB’s, SOHO’s, all verticals & the agencies and channel partners that serve them. Our programs offer easy set up and seamless integration to support your white labeled offering or affiliate program.

We’ve now added a full suite of products for our agencies & channel partners to promote specializing in claiming, video, optimization, verification, social, reporting and analytics. E-mail Contact@ubl.org to learn more about our Essential, Premium, Professional and UBL Express Products.

milestones.description: UniversalBusinessListing.org (www.UBL.org), a service of Name Dynamics, Inc (NDIX), today announced the expansion of its United States West Coast operations with the appointment of key executives.
milestones.source_description: UniversalBusinessListing.org Expands U.S. West Coast Operations with Appointments of Key Executives
